author: Clyde the Hobo

text: I love this one, especially the shift at 0:38 and the great bass. Great sound mastering. I'm still surprised to see how much of a decline in sales outside of Japan this series had after each release. I'm sure Sony could find a way to reboot this franchise soon, especially with the surprisingly great sales of the latest Ratchet & Clank game. It shows that there's new demand for 3D platformers on Sony's console.
author: SupraDarky

text: To be fair, Ratchet & Clank had a movie tie-in, hence why it sold so well. 3D Platformers without movie tie-ins may not be so lucky. Of course, I hope I'm wrong! X3
author: Medal Melodies

text: The game came out before the movie tie in though so I think a better explanation would be that since it was another game in a great series it was able to do well.
